definition: plain/informal/suitable/convenient/opportune/to urinate or defecate/equivalent to 就[jiu4]: then/in that case/even if/soon afterwards
to carry/to take along/to bring along/to hold (hands)/also pr. [xi1]

sentences.english: Hideyoshi himself brought along two portable teahouses in starkly contrasting styles.
sentences.chinese: 丰臣秀吉本人带来了两个风格截然不同的便携式茶馆。

sentences.english: After some furious finger tapping on the keyboard of a Personal Digital Assistant, Fei Fei leaned back in her chair.
sentences.chinese: 菲菲的手指在便携式电脑键盘上飞快地敲着。

sentences.english: Everything you need bundled into one simple, tidy, portable package.
sentences.chinese: 你需要的一切捆绑成一个简单，整齐，便携包。

sentences.english: Provide a connection for hooking up to a portable filtration unit.
sentences.chinese: 提供一个连接到一个便携式猎艳过滤装置。

sentences.english: Gaming development for portables and remotely processing graphics - how possible this is?
sentences.chinese: 为便携式和远程处理图形如何可能这是游戏开发？

sentences.english: The USB transmission module of portable data acquisition instrument is introduced in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 介绍一种便携式数据采集仪的USB通讯模块。

sentences.english: My shop is newest promoted portable trades the clothes awning, completely has solved these difficult problems.
sentences.chinese: 我店最新推出的便携式换衣棚，完全解决了这些难题。

sentences.english: This thesis introduces a type of portable field first -aid diagnosis bed used in field medical aid station .
sentences.chinese: 一种适用于野战救护所的便携式野战急救诊断床。

sentences.english: Never place your tree near a heat source, such as a fireplace or portable heater.
sentences.chinese: 让树远离热源，比如壁炉或便携式加热器。

sentences.english: The paper introduces the frame principle of a portable natural gamma spectrum.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一种便携式天然伽马能谱测量仪的框图原理。

sentences.english: The F.B.I. confiscated Mr. Bell’s laptop, he said.
sentences.chinese: 贝尔还说FBI收走了他自己的便携式电脑。

sentences.english: So, what's the best answer for portable app users?
sentences.chinese: 所以，什么是对便携应用用户最好的回答？

sentences.english: For the most part we’ve managed to make our technology mobile.
sentences.chinese: 在大多数情况下，我们已经把我们的科技便携化了。

sentences.english: For example, most portables do not have side walls or entrance flaps.
sentences.chinese: 例如，大多数便携式产品没有入口侧墙壁或皮瓣。

sentences.english: It's called a stereo portable handsfree because it's for more than listening.
sentences.chinese: 这就是所谓的立体声便携免提装置，因为它比听的。

sentences.english: Need 512 MB of portable memory for your Xbox?
sentences.chinese: 你的Xbox需要一个512MB的便携式记录卡吗？

definition: (of a magnet) to attract metallic objects/(fig.) to exert a magnetic attraction (for investment, tourists etc)
